EmailTemplate.subject: Save 15% On Summer Party Supplies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* Save on summer office party supplies with 15% OFF** your next purchase of $75 or more.
Use Code 1906SAVE Sign In <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBBSJUNEEMAIL2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Shop Breakroom Supplies Candy & Snacks <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Candy-Snacks/_/N-dvl?cmp=EBBSJUNEEMAIL2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Beverages <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Beverages/_/N-dva?cmp=EBBSJUNEEMAIL2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Papers & Dispensers <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Breakroom-Papers-Dispensers/_/N-dvg?cmp=EBBSJUNEEMAIL2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Food Service Supplies <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Food-Service-Supplies/_/N-dwa?cmp=EBBSJUNEEMAIL2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra?cmp=MDROPBIGDEALSEN?cmp=EBBSJUNEEMAIL2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1906SAVE at checkout. Not valid on special furniture orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires June 30, 2019.
